items.text: Small gatherings feel more comfortable than large ones
I approach strangers and start conversations
I prefer deep conversations over small talk
I enjoy attending parties, events, and gatherings
I need alone time after being with people
I actively engage even in unfamiliar settings
I observe quietly and speak only when needed
I enjoy networking with diverse people
I maintain a few deep relationships long-term
